Special Agent O tells you to go to the mini dungeon and bring back #b#t4031988##k from the Agent Box which appears after 30 minutes.
#i4031988# #t4031988# #b#c4031988# / 1

#k Each time you collect 10 badges, you'll receive #bAgent O's Nylon Gloves#k and when you collect 100, you can get #bAgent O's Leather Gloves#k.
Special Agent O asked you to disarm the Agent Box in the mini dungeon and retrieve a Special Agent Badge, and you successfully completed his mission.
...#b(He is staring into space.)\r\n#L0#Hello. Are you Special Agent O? Um... Gaga... I mean Agent G sent me to see you. #l
Agent G? Who's that?\r\n#b#L0#You haven't? Oh. Uh, he sort of has a long face with a butterfly neck tie...um...and...#l

Oh... He must be the new guy. I've never met him personally, but I heard he's been put in charge of recruiting new agents. So, why are you here? I'm quite busy.#b\r\n#L0#I was told to help you with your mission.#l
You're an agent? Eh, I didn't know they'd send a rookie... Oh well, it should be fine. First, you sure you even want to do this? Could be dangerous.
I'm assuming you know about Master M? Finding Master M is the most important thing, but it ain't easy.

Special agents are spread throughout Maple World, collecting intel, uploading it onto badges, and sending them to me. These Special Agent Badges are being collected in Agent Boxes in mini dungeons. Your job is to go in the mini dungeon and retrieve them.

But it won't be easy. The Agent Box has a special security feature on it, where it won't appear until 30 minutes after you've connected. Wait 30 minutes inside the mini dungeon, and when the Agent Box appears, retrieve the Special Agent Badge and bring it to me.
Each time you collect 10 Special Agent Badges, I will give you a pair of #bNylon Gloves#k. If you collect 100 Special Agent Badges, I will give you a pair of my favorite #bLeather Gloves#k.
...If you're afraid, then becoming an agent isn't for you.

The Agent Box has a special security feature on it, where you have to wait 30 minutes after you connect for it to appear. So wait 30 minutes inside the mini dungeon and when the Agent Box appears, retrieve the Special Agent Badge inside it.
